You are hereSSU Home ›  
Employee Housing






Welcome to Employee Housing
Sonoma State University is proud to offer employee-housing opportunities including Cabernet Village Apartments, Marina Crossing Apartments, and with the Sonoma Land Trust. The Employee Housing program assists employees in finding suitable and affordable housing.


Employee On-Campus Housing
Housing is available on campus in Cabernet Village Apartments and include two bedrooms, a living room, a kitchen, and one bathroom. Furnished (limited availability) and unfurnished apartments are available.

  
 



Marina Crossing Apartments
Marina Crossing Apartments are located in Petaluma and are a short distance from Sonoma State University. Marina Crossing Apartments include 90 living spaces ranging from studios to three-bedroom apartments.


 



Sonoma Land Trust
Sonoma State University formed a collaborative relationship with the non-profit Housing Land Trust of Sonoma County in an effort to provide housing for staff and faculty.
